shortDesc.message: Secure file sharing extension with end-to-end encryption, password protection, and anonymous transfers for maximum privacy.

storeDesc.message:
Anonymous file sharing extension with end-to-end encryption and password protection. Share files via secure public links or transfer directly between devices without registration.

Core Functionality:
▸ End-to-end encrypted file transfers
▸ Password-protected sharing links with captcha verification
▸ Anonymous file sharing without user accounts
▸ Direct device-to-device transfers
▸ Temporary file sharing with automatic expiration
▸ Cross-platform compatibility

Sharing Methods:
⭐ Public Links: Generate password-protected URLs with captcha security
⭐ Direct Transfer: Send files between devices with encryption
⭐ No server storage - files transfer directly or expire automatically
⭐ Compatible with Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS

Security Features:
🔒 Military-grade AES-256 encryption
🔒 No permanent file storage on servers
🔒 Password and captcha protection for shared links
🔒 Anonymous usage - no registration required
🔒 Open-source security architecture

User Interface:
The user interface is intuitive and clean, designed for easy navigation. Upload file and share link to download in seconds while our system protects your content from bots and scammers through advanced verification methods.

Technical Specifications:
- Peer-to-peer connection technology
- Progressive web application framework
- Responsive design for all screen sizes
- Regular security updates
- Browser-based operation

Use Cases:
➤ Business document sharing
➤ Educational material exchange
➤ Media file distribution
➤ Personal photo sharing
➤ Collaborative project files

Advantages:
• No file size restrictions for direct transfers
• Independence from cloud storage services
• Instant file sharing capabilities
• Multi-platform support
• Zero-cost solution

Support:
💡 Documentation and user guides
💡 FAQ section
💡 Community forums
💡 Customer support
💡 Regular feature enhancements

Secure, anonymous file sharing solution for modern digital collaboration needs.
